privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: bragforgood is operated by Claudia Hilti. For questions about this privacy policy, contact us at contact@bragforgood.com.
privacy.section2Intro: When you use bragforgood, we collect:
privacy.section2AccountText: name, email address, and password (stored securely hashed)
privacy.section3Item1: To provide and maintain the platform
privacy.section3Item3: To display your posts and profile to other users
privacy.section3Item4: To moderate content using AI (posts and comments are reviewed for community guideline compliance)
privacy.section3Item6: To send password reset emails when you request them
privacy.section4Intro: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.section4NeonText: database hosting (your data is stored securely)
privacy.section4AnthropicText: AI content moderation and translation (your post/comment text is sent for review)
privacy.section5Text: We keep your data as long as your account is active. If you want your account and data deleted, contact us at contact@bragforgood.com and we will remove it within 30 days.
privacy.section6Intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.section6Item1: Access the personal data we hold about you
privacy.section6Item4: Object to processing of your data
privacy.section6Gdpr: These rights apply under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the Swiss Federal Act on Data Protection (FADP/DSG), and other applicable data protection laws worldwide.
privacy.section6Contact: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at contact@bragforgood.com.
privacy.section7Text: We use only essential cookies required for authentication (session cookies). We do not use tracking cookies or analytics cookies.
privacy.section8Text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes by posting a notice on the platform.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text: By creating an account or using bragforgood, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.
terms.section2Text: bragforgood is a social platform where users share good deeds and positive actions. The platform is operated by Claudia Hilti and is provided as-is, free of charge.
terms.section3Item1: You must provide accurate information when creating an account
terms.section3Item2: You are responsible for keeping your password secure
terms.section3Item3: You must be at least 16 years old to use bragforgood
terms.section4Intro: When posting on bragforgood, you agree to:
terms.section4Item1: Only share genuine good deeds and positive actions
terms.section4Item2: Not post spam, offensive, hateful, or misleading content
terms.section4Item3: Not impersonate others or post on behalf of someone without permission
terms.section4Item4: Respect other users in comments and interactions
terms.section4Moderation: Content is reviewed by AI moderation. Posts or comments that violate these guidelines may be rejected or removed. Users who repeatedly violate guidelines may have their accounts suspended.
terms.section5Text: Users can report posts they believe violate our guidelines. Posts that receive multiple reports may be hidden from the feed. We review reports and take action as appropriate.
terms.section6Text: You retain ownership of the content you post on bragforgood. By posting, you grant us a non-exclusive license to display your content on the platform. You can delete your content at any time.
terms.section7Text: bragforgood is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the platform. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.
terms.section8Text: These terms are governed by the laws of Switzerland. Users from other countries are additionally subject to their local consumer protection laws where applicable.
terms.section9Text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.section10Text: For questions about these terms, contact us at contact@bragforgood.com.
